availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Leonard Drane (Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer & 1st sgt USA)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Shelby County native. Son of Stephen T. Drane and Bertha Ford Drane. Attended Eminence College. Farmer in Shelby County. Served in the 9th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a first sergeant from August 22, 1862, to January 1863.

ab.bibl:
William Henry Perrin, History of Bourbon, Scott, Harrison and Nicholas Counties, Kentucky (Chicago: O.L. Baskin & Co., 1882), 651.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 236.
